com.alohar.user.content
Class ALPlaceManager

java.lang.Object
  com.alohar.user.content.ALPlaceManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Observer
public class ALPlaceManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer

Manager of places and user stay. User can query places, user stays. The queries are asynchronous for better performance. The result will be called back when it is ready.

Register a place event listener to receive place related events, e.g. onArrival(), onDeparture(). Regular expression can be used to configure the specific type of places to listen to.

Version:
0.1
Author:
jianmingzhou

getLastKnownStay

public UserStay getLastKnownStay()
Returns the last known user stay detected. Depends on the system, the user stay might be stale. Null will return if there is no historic user stay on device

Returns:
the last know user stay

registerPlaceEventListener

public void registerPlaceEventListener(ALPlaceEventListener listener,
                                       java.lang.String namePattern,
                                       java.lang.String categoryPattern)
Registers a new event listener for events matches the place name and place category. Calling this method will override any other listener registered before.

Parameters:
listener - callback
namePattern - regex for place name
categoryPattern - regex for place category
Since:
v0.1
See Also:
ALPlaceEventListener

searchPlaces

public void searchPlaces(long startTime,
                         long endTime,
                         java.lang.String categoryPattern,
                         int visitCountFilter,
                         int limit,
                         ALEventListener callback)
Searches place profiles within a time window (startTime, endTime) matching the category pattern with visit count no less than visitCountFilter. The total number of places returned will be restricted to by limit parameters. It is asynchronous call, the result will be callbacked later.

Parameters:
startTime - start time in seconds
endTime - end time in seconds
categoryPattern - regex for category
visitCountFilter - times of visits
limit - total cap of the number of the result
callback - event = ALEvents.PLACES_QUERY_CALLBACK, data = ArrayList<PlaceProfile>
Since:
v0.1
See Also:
PlaceProfile, ALEvents, ALEventListener

                         ALEventListener callback)
Gets all user stays of a given place.

Parameters:
place -
callback - event = ALEvents.USERSTATS_OF_A_PLACE_CALLBACK, data = ArrayList<UserStay>
Since:
v0.1
See Also:
UserStay, ALEvents, ALEventListener

searchUserStays

public void searchUserStays(double latitude,
                            double longitude,
                            int radius,
                            long startTime,
                            long endTime,
                            boolean withCandidates,
                            int limit,
                            ALEventListener callback)
Searches user stays of a given location range within a time window. The total number of user stays returned is limited by limit variable.

Parameters:
latitude - valid value is from -90 to +90.
longitude - valid value is from -180 to +180.
radius - range radius in meter, > 0
startTime - start time in seconds
endTime - end time in seconds
withCandidates - True to append candidate list
limit - cap for total result
callback - event = ALEvents.USERSTAYS_QUERY_CALLBACK, data = ArrayList<UserStay>
Since:
v0.1
See Also:
UserStay, ALEvents, ALEventListener
